description: It is time for Marcus Mojo to kick back and be worshiped by Mason Wyler.Not one word is uttered,only the touch and amazement of Marcus's body is looked upon and tasted by Mason. Mr. Wyler takes his time getting the Mojo out of Marcus. Marcus loves to show off his well built physique and he gives Mason plenty of moves that would give any man a raging hard on. Come watch Marcus as his body is worshiped from head to toe.Enjoy!
title: Worship Me Bitch
